slogan: The most intuitive, flexible, teacher-friendly Learning Management System on the market today
have_account_question: Already have an account? Sign in
email_valid_message: Please enter a valid email address.
incorrect_email_or_password: The email address or password is incorrect. Please try again.
the_same_current_password: Your new password cannot be the same as your current password.
set_up_domain_help: In order to activate your account and create a Tabula Learning site for your organization, we need the following information.
domain_help_message: Use letters (a-z), number (0-9), and hyphens, but not start or end with a hyphen.
email_to_login_information: You will be using your email address {{email}} to sign in to your account.
your_login_information_message: You will be using your email address {{email}} to sign in to your organization's Tabula Learning site.
create_password_for_your_account: Create a Password for Your Account
invalid_confirm_password_message: Confirmed password does not match the password above.
invalid_password_message: Please choose a password that is 8-40 characters long.
invalid_link: The link you have followed has already been used or has expired.
setting_up_sub_domain_waiting: Please wait a few minutes while we set up your site. Or you can just close this page, and we will notify you via email when your site is ready.
reset_password_success: You have successfully reset your password.
success_in_confirmation_email: Congratulations. Your email was successfully confirmed.
changed_email_error: You are requested to change your email address. Please contact your administrator for more information.
changed_password_error: You are requested to change your password. Please contact your administrator for more information.
suspended_error: You are suspended. Please contact your administrator for more information.
signin_your_school_domain: Sign in to Your School Domain
invalid_domain: This domain is invalid or has been being suspended.
check_email: Check your <1>{{- email}}</1> inbox now. We've sent you a link to reset your password.
reset_password_message: Reset password for <1>{{- email}}</1>. This will change your password for this domain only.
mobile_browser_supported: Tabula Learning hasn't supported mobile browsers. Students and guardians, please get the app here:
